properties.name: zk.update-uri
properties.description: Update URL path to the DHtmlUpdateServlet, should start with a / and  end with a /*.

properties.name: zk.zul-path
properties.description: prefix to find zul page under /web/.

properties.name: zk.ee.comet
properties.description: Avoid duplicate installing of the CometAsyncServlet.

properties.name: zk.ee.websockets-enabled
properties.description: When enabled, you should add a listener to your zk.xml.

values.description: should start with a / end with /*.
use 'org.zkoss.zkmax.ws.filter.installed' when FR ZK-3799 is ready (8.5.1 ?)
